# description

**Instance Property**

A textual representation of this image tracking provider.

## Declaration

```swift
final var description: String { get }
```

## Inspecting an image-tracking provider

- **state**: The current status of data coming from a provider.
- **allAnchors**: An array of all the image anchors the provider is tracking.
